title: Provisionals system is broken
body: I'm currently going 0/4 in provisionals all because I have had 4 people DC every single game and you know what, that affects where I get placed, but does it matter? No, because even though I've been losing 4v5's the busted system doesn't take that into account and will give me a bad rank due to this unfair constant that has occured, riot I wish you would implement into the system something to make it less unfair for people who have consective DC's instead of basically looking at it like "well it happens, shit happens" because this isn't fair on my rank or anyone else who has had a constant of DC"s every single provisional game.
